column2: "Lou Malnati".  The number one repeated recommendation from Chicagoans (Chicagans? Chicagies? .....pizza boasters extraordinaire).  So we strolled on over to one of their many locations.  Lemme tell ya
column3: about three dozen other people had the same Saturday night dinner plan ( - das how you know eez gooood - ).  We put our name in for the hour wait and then perched like comfortable little vultures around the bar - hovering over every stool with pending check.
